alert.note: Alert for Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Southern Oneida; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 3:51PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Seneca, northern Oneida, northeastern Yates, northwestern Madison, Cayuga and Onondaga Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 349 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered thunderstorms across north central New York, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Onondaga, Syracuse, Clay, Rome, Cicero, Auburn, De Witt, Lysander, Van Buren and Baldwinsville. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 34A and 39, and near 41. New York Interstate 81 between 16A and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Southern Oneida; Yates
